blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: A Stable-ish Relationship
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2M3Ur1e

by hunka_hulka_burning_fudge

The thing is, it’s easier to be in love with Tony than it is to love Tony. Tony’s attention and affection are like a focused sunbeam – it warms you first and then burns you. It is ineffably easy to be in love with him. But to love Tony is not easy.
.
.

[A look at the ups-and-downs of Pepper and Tony’s relationship through the years.]

Words: , Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Marvel, The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types, The Avengers - Ambiguous Fandom, Iron Man (Movies)
  • Rating: General Audiences

  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Pepper Potts, Tony Stark, James Rhodes, Happy Hogan, Bruce Banner, Jarvis (Iron Man movies)
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Pepper Potts & Tony Stark, James “Rhodey” Rhodes & Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: POV Pepper Potts, Awesome Pepper Potts, Pepper Potts Feels, Pepper Potts & Tony Stark Friendship, Pepperony - Freeform, a frank look at Pepper’s and Tony’s relationship, Angst, Drama, Romance, Drama & Romance, Tony Stark Has Issues, Tony Stark Feels


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2M3Ur1e

blog.name: justareader
blog.title: Sergeant Barnes owns my ass !
blog.description:
Mermaid hair thrity French girl with a massive crush on two super soldiers, a Mad Hatter who hates Wonderland and a beautiful disaster Romanian prince with baby blues.
Basically I read, and sometimes, I write too. Ask me for my masterlist. I write fanfictions and original characters fictions.
I'm the author of The Princess and The Mad Hatter.
As you wish means I love you.
I don't take requests for the moment, maybe later. 
Drabbles prompt are close time I write those in my askbox.
NSFW contents sometimes and those posts are tag as it.
The name is Justine and the address is unfortunately not the 221B Baker Street.
None of the gifs used on that blog are mine, credit to owners.
I'm also on AO3 under the username DarknessTurnsMeOn

summary: so with spiderverse getting people more interested in the mutiverses of the marvel world id like to share some of my personal...
body:
so with spiderverse getting people more interested in the mutiverses of the marvel world id like to share some of my personal fav ult marvel characters 


so first captain anarchy. hes from the same universe as punk rock spiderman.

i love this for a few reasons. one his shielf has a spray painted a on it. 2 his outfit is shittyier in genral not in desgin but in quailty. the star is stitched on and it has a bunch of rips in it. and my fave of all. the cod piece. just. perfect. now this should be chirs Evans new movie role 

next one from the same universe but just as stupidly cool 

punk rock hylk. just. just look at him. hes amazing. he has a bunch of tattoos. a fucking Mohawk. and in unverse his nick name is the atom bomb. its just the best fucking thing!!! 

also if your wondering why he has ear buds its becuase in this universe he only turns hulk when he listens to music. its never said what kind it has to be but he bascally just has to put those ear buds in when he wants to go hulk. and i cant find an image of him un hulked out but when hes not hulk his hair drops to the side and stands up and turns green when hulked out

 .

then we have panda dead pool….its just…dead pool…as  a panda…. what more do i got to say its perfect

then we got superior spiderman.the idea here is that doctor octopuss takes over peters mind and bascally is the new spiderman. its fucking dumb as fuck but actually really cool. and kinda funny how doc oc bascally lives peters life so much better then he did. he became rich as fuck to  and made himself cool robo legs. 

then theres old man logan. whos…whos just sad…hes sad and old. pretty good

i could go on forever but ill keep it short. in conclusion multiverse are neat.

tags: 'disaster bi' is implied; nay: veritably required by the text
summary: Headcanoning Peter Parker as bisexual doesn’t need justification, but it has some anyway: The Parker Luck would never leave...
body: Headcanoning Peter Parker as bisexual doesn’t need justification, but it has some anyway: The Parker Luck would never leave Peter able to fuck up romantically with only ~half the population.

summary: Captain Marvel﻿: il produttore conferma la presenza di Yon-Rogg?
title: Captain Marvel﻿: il produttore conferma la presenza di Yon-Rogg?
body:
Captain Marvel﻿: il produttore conferma la presenza di Yon-Rogg?

Il produttore Jonathan Schwartz avrebbe, a quanto pare, confermato che Yon-Rogg apparirà in Captain Marvel.

A differenza di molte origin-story del passato della Marvel, Captain Marvel inizierà con lei che ha già i suoi super poteri. Carol sarà un soldato della Starforce che inizierà a ricordare la sua vita precedente quando si schianta sulla Terra. Questa potrebbe sembrare l’origine di Carol…

View On WordPress

Captain Marvel﻿: il produttore conferma la presenza di Yon-Rogg?

Il produttore Jonathan Schwartz avrebbe, a quanto pare, confermato che Yon-Rogg apparirà in Captain Marvel.

A differenza di molte origin-story del passato della Marvel, Captain Marvel inizierà con lei che ha già i suoi super poteri. Carol sarà un soldato della Starforce che inizierà a ricordare la sua vita precedente quando si schianta sulla Terra. Questa potrebbe sembrare l’origine di Carol…

Captain Marvel﻿: il produttore conferma la presenza di Yon-Rogg?

External image

Il produttore Jonathan Schwartz avrebbe, a quanto pare, confermato che Yon-Rogg apparirà in Captain Marvel.

A differenza di molte origin-story del passato della Marvel, Captain Marvel inizierà con lei che ha già i suoi super poteri. Carol sarà un soldato della Starforce che inizierà a ricordare la sua vita precedente quando si schianta sulla Terra. Questa potrebbe sembrare l’origine di Carol…
